product_title: Bottega Veneta Black Leather Grommet Slingback Flat Sandals Size 36
description: The flat sandals are designed from the most luxurious leather for maximum style. The leather soles make for a comfortable fit. These chic flats from Bottega Veneta will make your feet look pretty and fashionable. In a black shade, these can make you look elegant and sassy at the same time.

product_title: Dolce and Gabanna Black Criss Cross Velvet Platform Sandals Size 39
description: These stunning pumps by Dolce & Gabbana are aa must-have. Crafted in Italy, they are made from quality velvet and come in a classic shade of black. They feature crisscross straps and buckled ankle straps that provide support. They come with 14 cm block heels, velvet insoles, leather lining and soles and gold-tone hardware. They are further beautified with gold trims and elevate every outfit they are paired with.

product_title: Giuseppe Zanotti Black Suede Crystal Embellished Open Toe Mule Sandals Size 39
description: These stunning mules by Giuseppe Zanotti are designed to deliver style and glamour. They are crafted from black suede and have a lovely silhouette. They feature dramatic vamps that are further beautified by crystal embellishments. These open-toe sandals come with 13 cm heels, are lined with leather and have leather soles.

other_details.includes: Original Dustbag, Original Box, Info Booklet

product_title: Chanel Pink Leather Baroque Heel Slingback Sandals Size 38
description: These Chanel sandals stand out with their distinctively styled gold-tone heels and buckles. Crafted from pink leather, they feature peep toes and ankle wraps. Elevated on 11 cm heels, the leather-lined insoles carry brand detailing.

product_title: Burberry Blush Pink Irvington Horn Knot Capsule Sandals Size 38
description: These Irvington horn knot capsule sandals by Burberry stay true to the label’s elegant aesthetic. Made from blush pink leather, they are designed with a “wood grain" T-strap pendant and an ankle strap with buckle closure. This pair has a lightly padded, textile footbed and is lifted by a soaring stiletto heel.

product_title: Fendi Blue Leather Zucchino Heel Sandals Size 38
description: These azure blue stilettoes have a comfortably wide band to hold the foot. The slender ankle strap with buckle closure belies the firm grip on the contrast patterned heel with the FF logo and makes the gait effortless.

product_title: Louis Vuitton Black Suede Embellished Logo T Strap Sandals Size 40
description: These Louis Vuitton T-strap sandals will beautifully adorn your feet. The straps are made of suede while the insides are comfortably lined with leather. The pair features the brand's motifs and the signature LV in gold-tone at the front of the strap and they're balanced on stiletto heels. Flaunt these beauties with dresses and suits.
